synopsis.text: Shibuya's bustling streets become a sanctuary for young Ren, a nine-year-old orphan shunned by his remaining family. When he stumbles into the mystical realm of Shibuten, he encounters Kumatetsu, a formidable yet solitary beast craving respect and companionship. In this parallel universe where humans and beasts must not cross paths, Ren, now christened Kyuuta, becomes Kumatetsu's apprentice. As they forge an unbreakable bond, these two headstrong souls challenge the boundaries between their worlds. But when darkness looms, threatening both realms, their unlikely alliance faces the ultimate test, forcing them to unite their strengths and courage to save their homes.
